alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 12:11AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Roseau and central Lake of the Woods Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1210 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Springsteel Island, or 26 miles northeast of Roseau, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Arnesen around 1220 AM CDT. Swift around 1225 AM CDT. Roosevelt around 1235 AM CDT. Williams around 1245 AM CDT. Graceton around 1250 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
